title: Chad Eagle
text: Chad Eagle (born 24 August 1971 in <a href="Auckland">Auckland</a>, New Zealand) is a New Zealand <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who formerly played for the <a href="New%20Haven%20Warriors">New Haven Warriors</a> in the <a href="AMNRL">AMNRL</a>. His position is at lock. He previously played professional <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> in England for <a href="Bristol%20RFC">Bristol RFC</a> and <a href="London%20Irish">London Irish</a>.
